name: Block Puzzle - Color Blast
description:
This is an addictive, easy to learn game that will have your mind bending and your fingers flying.

Drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally.
The more rows you eliminate at one time, the more score you will be granted.

It is more Simple and addictive! Once you start, you will not stop playing. Just have a try, you will love it!

No time limit, you can enjoy game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
Only the game and your brain.

Mind challenging puzzle world! Use science of strategy and tactics. Enjoy it!
